message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it can bring to you, I'd like to extend an exclusive offer today. Would you be interested in exploring this opportunity further? Our initial offer for the product is $1500000.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price considering the market value. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
